      • isExempt

        public static boolean isExempt(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is exempt from the statistics.
        Performs a simple permissions check with node stats.track.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check
        Returns:
        true if the player's statistics should not be registered, false otherwise.

      • isExempt

        public static boolean isExempt(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
               java.lang.String statsType)
        Checks if the player is exempt from the statistics.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check
        statsType - Permission modifier
        Returns:
        true if the player's statistics should not be registered, false otherwise
